en: The registration information can only be submitted once and cannot be modified. Be careful!
Logging out of the Magic Blade account is a <color=#d6222eff>unrecoverable operation</color>
column5: and third-party account will also be unbound. In addition
column6: all of your Magic Blade game records will be irretrievable. Once the application for cancellation of the Magic Blade account is successfully initiated
column7: your Magic Blade account will be frozen immediately. You can re-log in to the Magic Blade account (such as Magic Blade Games
column8: Magic Blade official website) within 7 natural days from the date of successfully initiating the cancellation application. After you log in
column9: the frozen state will be automatically canceled. After 7 natural days from the date you successfully initiated the cancellation application
column10: the cancellation process will be officially completed
column11: your Magic Blade account will not be recoverable
column12: and you will not be able to retrieve any information or data of your Magic Blade account. If you wish to permanently cancel your account
